title: JSON Formatter Tool | Beautify JSON Data Online
description: Professional online JSON formatting tool that can convert messy JSON data into a formatted, indented standard form, improving JSON readability. Supports custom indentation size, brace style, and line width limits, helping developers debug and check JSON data.

input.placeholder: Paste JSON data to be formatted here
